parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sensors

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns if given unit is confirmed target for given side.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''isSensorTargetConfirmed''' side

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if confirmed target, otherwise [[false]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_enemyConfirmed = _possibleEnemy [[isSensorTargetConfirmed]]  [[opfor]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[listVehicleSensors]], [[isVehicleSensorEnabled]]
</value></part></template>
